Module org.example.miniproyecto2
Package org.example.miniproyecto2.Model

Class BoardAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.example.miniproyecto2.Model.BoardAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block, Board
public abstract class BoardAdapter extends Object implements IBoard
An abstract implementation of the IBoard interface.

This class provides a basic structure for a Sudoku board, with methods to manipulate the board's cells, validate values, and check the board's state.

  • Field Details

    • width

      protected int width
      The width (number of columns) of the board.

    • height

      protected int height
      The height (number of rows) of the board.

    • board

      protected List<List<Cell>> board
      A 2D list representing the cells of the board. Each cell is an instance of the Cell class.

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardAdapter

      public BoardAdapter(int width, int height)
      Constructs a new BoardAdapter with the specified width and height.

      The board is initialized as a 2D array of empty Cell objects.

      Parameters:
      width - the number of columns in the board
      height - the number of rows in the board

  • Method Details

    • isValueValid

      public boolean isValueValid(int cellRow, int cellCol, int value)
      Validates if a given value is valid for the specified cell.

      This implementation always returns false, and should be overridden in subclasses.

      Specified by:
      isValueValid in interface IBoard
      Parameters:
      cellRow - the row index of the cell (0-based)
      cellCol - the column index of the cell (0-based)
      value - the value to validate
      Returns:
      false by default

    • isCellValid

      public boolean isCellValid(int cellCol, int cellRow)
      Validates if the specified cell is valid inside the board.

      This implementation always returns false, and should be overridden in subclasses.

      Specified by:
      isCellValid in interface IBoard
      Parameters:
      cellRow - the row index of the cell (0-based)
      cellCol - the column index of the cell (0-based)
      Returns:
      false by default

      Specified by:

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if the board is completely filled with non-empty cells.
      Specified by:
      isFull in interface IBoard
      Returns:
